title: The GREATEST Filler Arc Ever?! (G8 Anime Arc, Episodes 196-206)
author: The One Piece Virgin
description: Comprehensive podcast coverage of the entire G-8 Arc including Episode 201, featuring Animak from AnimeUproar, Tekking101, Briggs from All Day Anime, and Nux Taku discussing why this filler arc is considered the best in One Piece

title: One Piece: G-8 Arc
author: Filler Academy
description: Podcast dedicated to analyzing filler arcs in anime, covering the entire G-8 Arc (Episodes 196-206) including Episode 201

title: Most Anime Wish Their Filler Was As Good As One Piece's
author: CBR Staff
description: Article discussing why the G-8 Arc, including Episode 201, is considered superior filler content compared to most anime filler arcs

title: One Piece Diaries #25: G-8 Arc
author: COMICON
description: Detailed diary-style recap and analysis of the G-8 Arc, covering episodes 196-206 including the bridge battle in Episode 201

title: One Piece: Who is Condoriano from the G-8 Arc?
author: ComingSoon
description: Explainer article about the Condoriano meme that originates from the G-8 Arc and continues in Episode 201, discussing its cultural impact on the One Piece fandom

title: One Piece: This Filler Arc Had the Funniest Joke in the Entire Show
author: Game Rant
description: Article highlighting the Condoriano joke from the G-8 Arc, which continues through Episode 201, as one of the funniest moments in One Piece

title: One Piece: G-8 Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: Comprehensive summary and review of the G-8 filler arc covering Episodes 196-206, including detailed recap of Episode 201's bridge battle and Condoriano continuation

title: One Piece: 10 Best Filler Arcs, Ranked
author: Dual Shockers
description: Ranking article that places the G-8 Arc at or near the top of best One Piece filler arcs, discussing Episode 201 and other highlights
